content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -24.5, -50.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and is not receiving power.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(-24.5, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -24.5, -50.0) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine at position -24.5, -50.0

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electricity connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network by placing electric poles nearby and ensuring they are powered.
- Check the status of electric poles to confirm they are operational and providing voltage.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to fluid connections
- Verify that the boiler has a source of water and that it is properly connected to the offshore pump to avoid it being out of fuel.
